value.title: Azure Lighthouse: A unified control plane for managing Azure at scale | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Archana Balakrishnan joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Lighthouse can manage hundreds of customers, thousands of subscriptions, and millions of resources from a unified control plane. ↓ Click SHOW MORE for full notes and links below ↓  Azure Lighthouse helps deliver managed services with comprehensive

value.title: Azure Monitor action groups | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Monitor action groups enable you to define a list of actions to execute when an alert is triggered. In this episode, we demonstrate how to configure a Service Health alert to use an action group. [00:50] Demo Start   Create and manage action groups in the Azure portal https://aka.ms/azfr/537/01

value.title: Azure Security Center – Just-in-Time Network Access
value.excerpt: Cloud hosted VM’s are prime targets for RDP and SSH brute force attacks because management ports are typically left in an open state. With Just in Time network access, you can put any of your ports, not just management ports, into a default deny state until a user requires access. Once access is requested,

value.title: Build ETL pipelines collaboratively using Git integration in Azure Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Enable Git source control (Azure DevOps Git or GitHub) in your data factories to do collaboration, source control, change tracking, change difference, continuous integration, and deployment. [00:55] Demo Start   Visual authoring in Azure Data Factory - Advantages of Git integration https://aka.ms/azfr/546/01

value.title: Code to Cloud with Docker and Azure Container Instances | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Chad Metcalf from Docker joins Scott Hanselman to show how to use the Docker CLI to deploy a container to Azure Container Instances (ACI). Using only the Docker CLI, Chad deploys a Minecraft image to ACI and then shares the public IP address with Scott so he can join in the wacky, blocky world!  ACI

value.title: Create dependent pipelines in your Azure Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Data integration is complex and has many moving parts that spans across hybrid data environments. value.title: Deploy your Web App in Windows Containers on Azure App Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Container support is available in preview in Azure App Service. value.title: Event-based data integration with Azure Data Factory | Azure Friday
